insert into five_ed_service_change (business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, step_id, stage_name, form_no, step_name, build_name, major_name, change_no, draw_no, change_reason, change_reason_detail, need_change_other, need_change_major, change_content, attach_count, attach_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeReasonDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needChangeOther,jdbcType=BIT}, #{needChangeMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update five_ed_service_change set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_name = #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_no = #{changeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_no = #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_reason = #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_reason_detail = #{changeReasonDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_change_other = #{needChangeOther,jdbcType=BIT}, need_change_major = #{needChangeMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_content = #{changeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attach_count = #{attachCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attach_no = #{attachNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, step_id, stage_name, form_no, step_name, build_name, major_name, change_no, draw_no, change_reason, change_reason_detail, need_change_other, need_change_major, change_content, attach_count, attach_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_service_change where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, step_id, stage_name, form_no, step_name, build_name, major_name, change_no, draw_no, change_reason, change_reason_detail, need_change_other, need_change_major, change_content, attach_count, attach_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_service_change
